flavorText: Masako was privy to a great many of Konda's deepest secrets, and her hair was always perfect.

foreignData.flavorText: Masako war in viele der größten Geheimnisse Kondas eingeweiht, und ihr Haar saß immer perfekt.
foreignData.name: Verzierte Kanzashi
foreignData.text: {2}, {T}: Ein Gegner deiner Wahl entfernt die oberste Karte seiner Bibliothek ganz aus dem Spiel. Du kannst diese Karte in diesem Zug spielen.

foreignData.flavorText: Masako conocía muchos de los secretos mejor guardados de Konda, y su cabello estaba siempre perfecto.
foreignData.name: Kanzashi adornado
foreignData.text: {2}, {T}: El oponente objetivo remueve del juego la carta de la parte superior de su biblioteca. Puedes jugar esa carta este turno.

foreignData.flavorText: Masako connaissait bon nombre des grands secrets de Konda, et ses cheveux étaient toujours parfaitement coiffés.
foreignData.name: Kanzashi orné
foreignData.text: {2}, {T} : L'adversaire ciblé retire de la partie la carte du dessus de sa bibliothèque. Vous pouvez jouer cette carte ce tour-ci.

foreignData.flavorText: Masako era al corrente di gran parte dei più oscuri segreti di Konda e i suoi capelli erano sempre perfetti.
foreignData.name: Kanzashi Decorato
foreignData.text: {2}, {T}: L'avversario bersaglio rimuove dal gioco la prima carta del proprio grimorio. Puoi giocare quella carta in questo turno.

foreignData.flavorText: 昌子は今田の最も深遠な秘密のかなり多くに通じている。それでも彼女の髪はいつでも完璧だ。
foreignData.name: 華麗なる簪
foreignData.text: {2}, {T}：対戦相手１人を対象とする。そのプレイヤーは自分のライブラリーの一番上のカードをゲームから取り除く。 このターン、あなたはそのカードをプレイしてもよい。

foreignData.flavorText: Masako conhecia muitos dos segredos mais profundos de Konda, e o cabelo dela estava sempre perfeito.
foreignData.name: Kanzashi Ornamentado
foreignData.text: {2}, {T}: O oponente alvo remove de jogo o card do topo de seu próprio grimório. Você pode jogar aquele card neste turno.

foreignData.flavorText: 昌子知晓许多今田的高度机密，而她的发型总是一丝不茍。
foreignData.name: 华美发簪
foreignData.text: {2}，{T}：目标对手将其牌库顶牌移出对战。 你可在本回合中使用该牌。

name: Ornate Kanzashi
originalText: {2}, {T}: Target opponent removes the top card of his or her library from the game. You may play that card this turn.

rulings.text: Normal restrictions apply to cards exiled by Ornate Kanzashi (you can’t cast an instant unless you have priority, etc.).
Cards exiled by Ornate Kanzashi’s ability are exiled face up.
You must pay all costs to play cards exiled by Ornate Kanzashi.
You can’t play cards you exiled with Ornate Kanzashi on previous turns.
Cards exiled by Ornate Kanzashi’s ability stay exiled even if the Kanzashi leaves the battlefield.

text: {2}, {T}: Target opponent exiles the top card of their library. You may play that card this turn.
